column5: What time do the Beer and Bottle stores close in Ft. Frances on Satudays? I looked on-line and shows they close at 6 p.m. and do not open till noon on sundays. Is that right?
I think the Beer Stores close at 6 every night.

Good luck getting to the beer store. Portage Street is under construction, or I should say the rail bridge is and the street is blocked. You have to go all the way west to McIrvine Road and then east on 5th Street E.
